hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd $WORKSPACE/flask name=ml-flask-dev version=`date +"%Y%m%d_%H%M"` # build image docker build . -t us-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name:$version #3#docker tag us-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name:$version us-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name:latest # push image docker push us-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name:$version #3#docker push us-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name:latest
cd $WORKSPACE/module name=ml-module-dev version=`date +"%Y%m%d_%H%M"` # build image docker build . -t us-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name:$version #3#docker tag us-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name:$version us-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name:latest # push image docker push us-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name:$version #3#docker push us-repo.cloud.mi.com/nuwa/$name:latest
